oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Belmont Art Theatre's feature film, The Bride is Much Too Beautiful
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Film posters; Motion Pictures; Theaters; ;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing Belmont Art Theatre's showing of the Bride Is Much Too Beautiful with Louis Jourdan and Brigitte Bardot on November 6.
